description: i listened to blonde otw back from houston and it reminded me of u

song: Me vs. You - Everyone Asked About You
description: we saw them play live in houston and they closed the set with the song, we both cried the whole time..
u played this and started dancing while we went back to my apt to feed bruno
this was playing on loop while we napped in my car after memorial park

song: Wouldn't It Be Nice - The Beach Boys

description: i saw a video of the strokes playing this live on ig after you left for houston today and it reminded me of u, i miss u :(
we both wrote the lyrics to this song :D

song: Mercury Girl - The Cleaners From Venus
description: this song was playing as we drove back from potbelly today

song: As We Go Up, We Go Down - Guided By Voices

i was walking around austin yesterday listening to this song and missing you

song: Blue Sea, Red Sea - Billie Marten
description: you played this song in our spotify jam while we were working

song: I'm Your Dirt, I'm Your Love - Yung Lean
description: you posted that screenshot of a dead fish at the dog park that i took while we were on facetime to this song
you sent me this album today while I was working, i miss you..
this song was playing while you were petting my face as i was driving you back to your apartment after we got your dad a bamboo plant

thank you for putting me on this, ive lowkey had fakemink on repeat while making this site lol
